original_title: Letters to My Ex-Lover: A Conversation in 6 Parts
overview: If you could say anything to your first love, what would it be? In Emily Bayrock's new poignant documentary, 6 young people discuss their first experiences with love, and what they would say to their first love if they could go back as who they are now.
title: Letters to My Ex-Lover: A Conversation in 6 Parts
